founders.title: Founders

founders.description: Meet the visionaries who brought HENQ Technologies to life.

journey.title: Our Journey
journey.paragraph1: HENQ Technologies was founded with a simple yet ambitious vision: to bridge the gap between cutting-edge technology and practical business solutions. Our founders bring together decades of experience in software development, artificial intelligence, and business strategy.
journey.paragraph2: We believe that the future belongs to those who can harness technology not just to solve today's problems, but to anticipate tomorrow's opportunities. That's why we're committed to continuous innovation and pushing the boundaries of what's possible.

seo.defaultTitle: HENQ Technologies GbR - Innovative Technology Solutions from Germany
seo.defaultDescription: HENQ Technologies GbR develops cutting-edge AI solutions, cloud platforms, and IoT frameworks. Technology consulting and custom software development from Medebach, Germany.
